message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, even more so than it is to me. I'm willing to offer it to you first at a premium price of $1,500,000. This is a limited-time offer, as I have other interested parties.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $750,000 is significantly below its true value and my initial asking price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,250,000.  This offer stands as long as we close the deal this round.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I still think $1,000,000 is the maximum I can go. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
